contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | image = Diptera-Syrphidae-Xylota-sylvarum-201208160110.JPG | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropod]]a | classis = [[Insect]]a | ordo = [[Fly|Diptera]] | familia = [[Syrphidae]] | genus = ''[[Xylota]]'' | species = '''''X. sylvarum''''' | binomial = ''Xylota sylvarum'' | binomial_authority = ([[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], [[Systema Naturae|1758]]) | synonyms = *''Musca longisco'' <small>[[Moses Harris|Harris]], 1780</small> *''Musca sylvarum'' <small>[[Carolus Linnaeus|Linnaeus]], [[Systema Naturae|1758]]</small> *''Xylota longisco'' <small>([[Moses Harris|Harris]], 1780)</small> }} '''''Xylota sylvarum''''' is a common [[Europe]]an species of [[hoverfly]].<ref>{{cite book|author=Stubbs, Alan E. and Falk, Steven J.|year=1983 |title=British Hoverflies: An Illustrated Identification Guide|pages=253, xvpp |publisher=British Entomological & Natural History Society}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xylota Sylvarum}} [[Category:Diptera of Europe]] [[Category:Hoverflies]] [[Category:Animals described in 1758]] {{Syrphidae-stub}}
